attributes.title: absolutely DISGUSTING
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app, it showered me with so many horrible questions like if I was a virgin or if I had worms for brains. There was even a glitch of a rat that kept saying the f four AND the r slur. Please, Donald, do us all a favor and resign😃❤️

I think is app should be deleted from all existence. There is no point in having an orange 🍊 president 👁👄👁 i am a Tik Tok addicted so i would like if it would please not be banned from the United States of America 🇺🇸 thank you 🙏🏼

attributes.title: 🤢 gross!!!🤮
attributes.review: What even is this app!? I downloaded it and once I opened it my phone started glitching! I opened it again and saw disturbing things on it too, Please take this app down! This is disgusting!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app has caused my phone so many problems. I had to delete it because it made all my other apps keep crashing.

attributes.title: ✨ewuh✨
attributes.review: some fat uggo orange guy plastered everywhere kept lagging I couldn’t scroll or tap I’m pretty sure it asked for my credit card info maybe someone already hacked it. This app is the definition of ghettoo

attributes.title: This app is awful
attributes.review: Every time I open it, it’s a jump scare. It’s crazy dude. Like as soon as it loads, this monster jumps out of nowhere. Like it’s a super orange and scary idk how anyone can actually get past that scare bc it’s terrifying!!!

attributes.title: Ur mom 👁💩👁
attributes.review: trump is a horrible person he’s taking my therapist aka tik tok away from me ITS THE ONLY THINK KEEPING ME FROM GOING OUT OF CONTROL , i would very much appreciate it if u could please keep tik tok , it’s my escape from the world and my problems :) you racist cow , thank you , bye :))

attributes.title: Didn’t work at all
attributes.review: This app was absolutely awful and kept making my phone crash. Do not recommend! Plus gen z for the win🤪🤩

attributes.title: I don’t like it😬
attributes.review: This app took a total of a week, two days, and 6 hours to download. The spinning T on the home page of the screen gave me motion sickness and I threw up on my phone.

attributes.title: ewwww bunker boy
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app because i was curious about how bad out president is and it’s kinda hard to see when the app crashes every 2 seconds if anybody from the white house reads this
